verses.text: \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* if \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w any|strong="H3426"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6437"\w* \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* some \w of|strong="H6918"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w saints|strong="H6918"\w*.

\w Anger|strong="H7068"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* killeth \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w foolish|strong="H0191"\w*, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w envy|strong="H7068"\w* slayeth \w the|strong="H3588"\w* little \w one|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w fool|strong="H0191"\w* \w with|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* strong \w root|strong="H8327"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* cursed \w his|strong="H7200"\w* beauty \w immediately|strong="H6597"\w*.

\w His|strong="H5337"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w safety|strong="H3468"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0369"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H7368"\w*.

\w Whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7456"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* armed man \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* violence, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* thirsty \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* drink \w up|strong="H0398"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w riches|strong="H2428"\w*.

\w Nothing|strong="H3808"\w* upon \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* \w is|strong="H0127"\w* done \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* voice cause, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H0205"\w* doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spring|strong="H6779"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0127"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*.

\w Man|strong="H0120"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* labour \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* bird \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w fly|strong="H5774"\w*.

Wherefore \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* pray \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* address \w my|strong="H7760"\w* speech \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

\w Who|strong="H0369"\w* doth \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w things|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* unsearchable \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w wonderful|strong="H6381"\w* \w things|strong="H1419"\w* \w without|strong="H0369"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w*:

\w Who|strong="H0776"\w* giveth \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* watereth all things \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*:

Who setteth \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w humble|strong="H8217"\w* \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w*, \w and|strong="H3468"\w* comforteth \w with|strong="H6937"\w* health those \w that|strong="H7760"\w* \w mourn|strong="H6937"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H6213"\w* bringeth \w to|strong="H3027"\w* nought \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w designs|strong="H4284"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* malignant, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w accomplish|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3027"\w* begun:

\w Who|strong="H2450"\w* catcheth \w the|strong="H3920"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w in|strong="H2450"\w* their craftiness, \w and|strong="H4116"\w* disappointeth \w the|strong="H3920"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H6098"\w* \w the|strong="H3920"\w* wicked:

\w They|strong="H3915"\w* shall \w meet|strong="H6298"\w* \w with|strong="H2822"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w in|strong="H4959"\w* \w the|strong="H3915"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w grope|strong="H4959"\w* \w at|strong="H4959"\w* noonday as \w in|strong="H4959"\w* \w the|strong="H3915"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

But \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* violent.

\w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* needy \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H6310"\w* \w he|strong="H6310"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w shall|strong="H6310"\w* draw \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* mall \w whom|strong="H0582"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* correcteth: refuse \w not|strong="H0408"\w* therefore \w the|strong="H2009"\w* chastising \w of|strong="H0433"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* lord:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* woundeth, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* cureth: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* striketh, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3808"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* troubles \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5060"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w*, \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* thee.

\w In|strong="H7458"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w deliver|strong="H6299"\w* thee \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H7458"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

Thou shalt \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hidden|strong="H2244"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w scourge|strong="H7752"\w* \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* calamity \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* cometh.

\w In|strong="H0776"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7701"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w famine|strong="H3720"\w* \w then|strong="H3372"\w* shalt \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w lands|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H1285"\w* pence \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H3045"\w* thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w is|strong="H2398"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w visiting|strong="H6485"\w* thy beauty thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

Thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w also|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* multiplied, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w grass|strong="H6212"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Thou shalt \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w grave|strong="H6913"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* abundance, \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* heap \w of|strong="H6256"\w* wheat \w is|strong="H0935"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w its|strong="H5927"\w* \w season|strong="H6256"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w even|strong="H3651"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*, \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w we|strong="H8085"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w searched|strong="H2713"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w*: \w which|strong="H1931"\w* thou having \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, \w consider|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* thoroughly \w in|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w mind|strong="H3045"\w*.
